701169f-a.title: Bronx: Grand Concourse - Tremont Avenue (East)
701169f-a.text:
Grand Concourse, at the S.W. corner of East Tremont Ave., showing the Mt. Hope Methodist Episcopal Church. The 5-story apartment house, on the left, is No. 1895, at the S.W. corner of East 177th Street.
July 17, 1935.
P. L. Sperr.
701169f-a.folder: Grand Concourse & Tremont Avenue (East), Bronx, NY
